name: Crow Gambles
description:
A game about two crows having some fun on a lovely day. 

This is a submission for Mini Jam 99: Birds, where you have three days to make a game that conforms to some limitation.

Made with Godot Engine.

  • Music by Kip Robin
  • Crow sprite by https://seethingswarm.itch.io/ with additional animations from me
  • Cloudy sky by https://savvycow.itch.io/loudypixelsky
  • Sound effects from https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects and https://freesfx.co.uk/sfx/
